markdown:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

## Articles in this section

- [How can I buy PH stocks in GStocks PH?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/17532438364057-How-can-I-buy-PH-stocks-in-GStocks-PH)

## Promoted articles

- [What are the steps to get a Fully Verified GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017722393-What-are-the-steps-to-get-a-Fully-Verified-GCash-account)
- [Accepted IDs for GCash Verification](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/900000948786-Accepted-IDs-for-GCash-Verification)
- [How do I send money to another GCash account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360017566614-How-do-I-send-money-to-another-GCash-account)

Once you've submitted a buy or sell order and it's received, you can track its status on the " **Orders**" page. You'll see a message on your screen indicating the status of your order, which will also reflect on your account records.

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/41093339065753)

Here are the possible order symbols and their corresponding status for your reference:

|     |     |     |
| --- | --- | --- |
| **Order Status** | **Description** | **Symbol** |
| Completed / Filled | Order has been successfully completed / filled | **✓** |
| Rejected / Cancelled | Order has been rejected / cancelled | **✗** |
| Open / Pending | Order is still open and waiting to be completed | **↻** |
| Replaced | Order has been modified (replaced with new open order) | **⇆** |

Once your order has been completed after the number of processing days, you can view it on the “Portfolio” page.

![](https://help.gcash.com/hc/article_attachments/41093509652633)
